resources.string: Unable to connect. Please check your internet connection!
Google Play Services are missing from your device!
Password must be a minimum of 6 characters

We are requesting the call phone permission as it is absolutely necessary for the app to perform it\'s functionality.\nPlease select \"Grant Permission\" to try again and \"Cancel \" to exit the application.

You have rejected the call phone permission for the application. As it is absolutely necessary for the app to perform you need to enable it in the settings of your device.\nPlease select \"Go to settings\" to go to application settings in your device and \"Cancel \" to exit the application.

We are requesting the camera and Gallery permission as it is absolutely necessary for the app to perform it\'s functionality.\nPlease select \"Grant Permission\" to try again and \"Cancel \" to exit the application.

You have rejected the camera and Gallery permission for the application. As it is absolutely necessary for the app to perform you need to enable it in the settings of your device.\nPlease select \"Go to settings\" to go to application settings in your device and \"Cancel \" to exit the application.

We are requesting the location permission as it is absolutely necessary for the app to perform it\'s functionality.\nPlease select \"Grant Permission\" to try again and \"Cancel \" to exit the application.

You have rejected the location permission for the application. As it is absolutely necessary for the app to perform you need to enable it in the settings of your device.\nPlease select \"Go to settings\" to go to application settings in your device and \"Cancel \" to exit the application.
